Articles.Content:
Hello to all, I salute you from Spain

I've been playing KSP since its version 0.19.1 and now I decided to stop being a simple reader to be an active part of the Forum. The reason is very simple, find direct response of "modders" of incidents that I was finding in the mods since version 1.1 was launched. Sorry for my bad English, I am using an automatic translator

see you later friends!!!

Hello Dux Aquila and welcome to the forum!

I salute you from Canada.

It's always good to greet a lurker turned community member.  Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
